Resemblance Description: A single horizontal stroke, resembling the number one.
Example Sentence (Pinyin): 这是一本书。 (Zhè shì yī běn shū.)
Memory Helper: Imagine a single horizontal stroke, representing "one." (pronounced "ee")

Resemblance Description: Two horizontal strokes, resembling the number two.
Example Sentence (Pinyin): 我有两个兄弟。 (Wǒ yǒu liǎng gè xiōngdì.)
Memory Helper: Imagine two horizontal strokes, representing "two." (pronounced "are")

Resemblance Description: Three horizontal strokes, resembling the number three.
Example Sentence (Pinyin): 今天是三月三号。 (Jīntiān shì sān yuè sān hào.)
Example Sentence (English): Today is the third of March.
Memory Helper: Imagine three horizontal strokes, representing "three." (pronounced "san")

Resemblance Description: A vertical line with a horizontal line, resembling the number four.

Resemblance Description: A slanted line with a horizontal line, resembling the number five.
